name: CVE-2022-43671
description: Zoho ManageEngine Password Manager Pro before 12122, PAM360 before 5711, and Access Manager Plus before 4306 allow SQL Injection.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_access_manager_plus:4.3:build4300:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_access_manager_plus:4.3:build4301:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_access_manager_plus:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_access_manager_plus:4.3:build4302:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_password_manager_pro:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_password_manager_pro:12.1:build12100:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_access_manager_plus:4.3:build4303:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_access_manager_plus:4.3:build4304:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_password_manager_pro:12.1:build12110:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_access_manager_plus:4.3:build4305:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_pam360:5.7:build5710:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_pam360:5.7:build5700:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_pam360:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_password_manager_pro:12.1:build12121:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_password_manager_pro:12.1:build12101:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:zohocorp:manageengine_password_manager_pro:12.1:build12120:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
